participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and determined, struggling with feelings of unfairness and disappointment in her career.
participant_1.background: I want to get married again. I am angry at my coworker. I wish my boyfriend did not want an open relationship. I am not going to go the extra mile anymore. I have 10 years experience in our industry, yet she gets promoted.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and supportive, with a passion for music and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: I play the violin. I have a pomeranian. My older sister plays clarinet. My mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.

content.text: I'm so frustrated with my job right now. I have 10 years experience and she gets promoted.
That's so unfair! What do you do?
Oh, that's a tough field. Are you looking for a new job?
I'm not sure yet. I'm just so angry right now.
I know how you feel. I've been there before.
It's so hard to work with someone who is so much less experienced than me and gets rewarded for it.
It's definitely frustrating. I would be angry too.
I don't know what to do.
Well, you could always talk to your boss about it.
I don't know if that would do any good.
It's worth a try. You could also start looking for a new job.
I'm not sure if I'm ready for that.
Well, you don't have to do anything right now. You can just take some time to think about it.
You're welcome. I'm always here for you.
